revised_title: Pharmacological Analysis of Aconitine, Diacetylaconitine, Benzaconine, and Aconine
tldr: This study investigates the pharmacological properties and chemical composition of aconitine, diacetylaconitine, benzaconine, and aconine, alkaloids found in the Aconitum plant. The authors analyze the effects of these substances on blood pressure, pulse, respiration, and toxicity in various animals, providing insights into their potential medical applications and risks.
